message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I think it's a great deal and you'll find it very valuable.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $87.50?
